timeline.body: Super small nitpick, but a description should end in a period, to keep consistent with other descriptions
timeline.bodyText: Super small nitpick, but a description should end in a period, to keep consistent with other descriptions
timeline.bodyHTML: Super small nitpick, but a description should end in a period, to keep consistent with other descriptions
timeline.author: ShaneBeee

timeline.body:
In my opinion, for readability this should be split, ex:
```java
@Examples({"spawn a wolf at player's location",
    "make last spawned wolf attack player"})
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
In my opinion, for readability this should be split, ex:

@Examples({"spawn a wolf at player's location",
    "make last spawned wolf attack player"})
timeline.author: ShaneBeee

timeline.body: Patterns should be on their own lines. Also, shouldn't it be `livingentities`? I don't know if that actually matters though.

timeline.body: We usually don't include annotations like this. It should be okay for the warning to be there.
